import React, {useLayoutEffect} from 'react' import "./services.css" import { servicesCard } from "../../dummydata" import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next' const CoursesCard = () => { useLayoutEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0)}); const [t] = useTranslation("global"); return (
{servicesCard.map((val) => { return (

{t(`Habout.${val.serviceName}`)}

{t(`Habout.${val.detail}`)}

    {val.serviceList.map((l) => (
  • {t(`Habout.${l}`)}
    • ))}

{t("Habout.from")}

{t(`price.${val.priceAll}`)}

{t(`workDay.${val.workDay}`)}

) })}
) } export default CoursesCard
